( CNN)- Former Secretary of State Colin Powell , who endorsed Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said Sunday that while the George W. Bush has addressed some of his campaign promises, he still has got a way to go. He credited Barack Obama with stabilizing the economy, tackling health care reform and working with countries around the world, but declined to give the George W.
